event.title: Free Software day in Krems, Austria
event.body: Starting at 9:00am, the Donau-Universit√§t Krems invites teachers, pupils, parents and everyone interested to inform themselves about the benefits of using Free Software and GNU/Linux in school environments. The FSFE will be present with a stand, and Peter Bubestinger will give a speech titled "Freedom of education in the digital age? Free software!" (in German).
